Half-Life 2 com toda certeza é um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei na vida, pois ele possui gráficos lindos com uma jogabilidade muito boa e divertida, os seus personagens são bastante carismáticos e o seu enredo é sensacional pois ele é um enredo que te prende do começo ao fim e deixa você super imerso na história do jogo. Eu me diverti muito jogando o jogo e se fosse para dar uma nota para ele eu daria nota 10 porque o jogo é perfeito vale muito a pena recomendo a todos.

HALF - LIFE 2, no es un simple juego, es un regalo de lo dioses que fue forjado en las fauces de la creatividad y la diversión. Al haberlo completado al 100% en 45 horas, tengo el privilegio de recomendar esta hermosa creación que se nos ah traído a los mortales, si aun no lo has jugado no se que has hecho con tu vida, deja de pensar y JUÉGALO.
神作，不多说。

This is a really good follow up to the original Half Life and it improves on a lot of things. The graphics have improved from 98 and it may not be the "Best" graphics nowadays but they are still an improvement. It also does have a more ambitious story and is a lot less linear than the first. In my opinion I prefer the weapons from the first game a bit more but the weapons are still fun to mess around with especially the gravity gun half way through the game. I would recommend this game a lot to everybody!.

This game sucks.

you go much slower, you can sprint but that takes up power,
flashlight takes that power too.
its hard to see what is a prop and what you need to hit
I can't find out where I'm supposed to go
friendly fire is OFF, so that's lame.
the story is dragging on so much.
not a recommended game to buy.

L'anima re' muort e' kitammuort raga stu gioco è prop na figata. Praticamente è succiess nu burdell e mo ce stann' gli alien' n'gopp a terra c'hanna sfasciat tutt cose e devi vutta' e mane a tutt quant. Poi troppo bello o' finale che m'ha arricurdàt quanne cu Gigi, Salvatore e Pasquale facemmo zumpà in aria Poggio Reale, tropp bell' uagliu. Però mocc' a kitammuort' Gabe addà fa ascì Half-Life 3 perché sinnò arrvote prop tutt' cos o frat.

First Half-life game I played when I was still new to steam. For a game that came out in 2004 this is still one of Valve’s best looking games. I’ve sunk about 3 playthroughs in this alone without Episode 1 and 2. I love how you don’t necessarily need to have played the previous game in order to know what’s going on, this game has its own story and unique gameplay. This is probably one of the best single player FPS games out there and if you haven’t played it I suggest you do so, easy 10/10 game from me
